trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol faces an unprecedented dilemma: a disastrous deluge of dead deer delicacies.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid rock salt in the K'mul Astropolis)) ((Deliver the splendid rock salt to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid tree bark in the K'mul Astropolis)) ((Deliver the splendid tree bark to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Spearfish a splendid Night's bass in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid Night's bass to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Our Viis friends have presented us with an enormous haul of venison as a sign of their appreciation for our work. The only problem is, there's so much of it, we'll need to smoke the meat before it goes rotten!
TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to bring me some rock salt? Sprinkling it on the meat beforehand draws out the rich, gamey flavors!
TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_002<tab>Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to bring me some tree bark? Naturally, only the most splendid will suffice.

TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_003<tab>Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to spear me a Night's bass? It may not be the most obvious choice, but apparently, smoking it together with the deer meat helps to preserve it.

TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_004<tab>If I could tear myself away from my duties here, I'd probably start by searching around the K'mul Astropolis. Something about the place simply screams “splendid,” wouldn't you agree?

TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_005<tab>If I could tear myself away from my duties here, I'd probably start by searching around the K'mul Astropolis. Something about the place simply screams “splendid,” wouldn't you agree?

TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_006<tab>If I could tear myself away from my duties here, and I had even the slightest inkling of how spearfishing works, I'd probably try my luck at Lake Tusi Mek'ta.
TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Have you brought that which I requested? Time is of the essence!
TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_011<tab>My word, this is splendid! Just the fragrance alone makes me want to gobble it all up, even without the venison...

TEXT_BANQIQ116_03821_QHOTERLPASOL_000_012<tab>Ah, of course, that would rather defeat the purpose of having you rush around before the meat spoils. And we wouldn't want the Viis' generous gift to go to waste, now, would we?
